paper.title: Is P versus NP formally independent?

chunks.label: Abstract & Introduction
covers: Paper scope; personal perspective on P vs NP; importance and objections

chunks.label: Formalizing P?=NP: Core definitions
covers: NP-completeness; Cook-Levin Theorem; canonical NP-complete problems

chunks.label: Related complexity concepts
covers: Search/decision/optimization; NP-intermediate; coNP; polynomial hierarchy; PSPACE; #P; EXP

chunks.label: Beliefs & difficulty
covers: Why Pâ‰ NP is widely believed; technical barriers; clever algorithms vs brute force

chunks.label: Strengthenings of P?=NP
covers: ETH; P/poly; average-case complexity; BPP; BQP; derandomization; quantum algorithms

chunks.label: Progress: Logical & combinatorial techniques
covers: Diagonalization; relativization barrier; proof complexity; monotone circuits; AC0 lower bounds; natural proofs barrier

chunks.label: Progress: Arithmetization & ironic complexity
covers: IP=PSPACE; hybrid circuit lower bounds; algebrization barrier; time-space tradeoffs

chunks.label: Progress: Arithmetic complexity theory
covers: Valiant's Conjecture; permanent vs determinant; arithmetic circuit lower bounds; arithmetic natural proofs

chunks.label: Progress: Geometric Complexity Theory (GCT)
covers: Algebraic geometry approach; symmetries; obstructions; GCT and P vs NP; recent developments; critical assessment

chunks.label: Conclusions, acknowledgments & appendix
covers: Summary; future directions; complexity class glossary; bibliography
